overview.title: Avatar Component
overview.description: Avatars represent users or entities with an image, initials, or an icon. They can also show presence with a small status dot.

best-practices.title: Best Practices
points: Always include meaningful alt text for avatars that convey identity.
Use a decorative alt="" only if a nearby label already conveys the personâ€™s name.
Ensure focus styles when avatars are interactive (e.g., used as buttons).
Provide fallbacks such as initials when an image fails to load.
Keep status indicators large enough to be visible against the avatar edge.
